sentences.en: Allocate the analysis of the price to the multinational inner part.
sentences.cn: 对跨国内部调拨价格的分析.

sentences.en: At least 2 years working experience in a multinational company.
sentences.cn: 至少两年以上的外企工作经验.

sentences.en: Each member company is known as a multinational corporation.
sentences.cn: 每一成员公司都被称作跨国公司.

sentences.en: Effective multinational efforts are essential to solve these problems.
sentences.cn: 有效的多国联合努力是解决这些问题的基础.

sentences.en: I was able to decode the data from Multinational Inc.
sentences.cn: 我能够破解来自多国公司的数据了.

sentences.en: In the mass production era multinational firms tended to centralize their operations.
sentences.cn: 在大规模生产的时代，跨国公司往往实行集权化经营。

sentences.en: It is characterized by multistate and even multinational companies.
sentences.cn: 它的特征是多州的、甚至是多国的公司.

sentences.en: Many multinational companies have substantial operations in this area.
sentences.cn: 许多跨国公司都在该地区从事相当规模的经营.

sentences.en: The company is a wholly-owned subsidiary of a large multinational.
sentences.cn: 这是一家大型跨国企业的全资子公司。

sentences.en: The destination or locus of multinational investment has changed.
sentences.cn: 跨国公司投资的流向地区起了变化.

sentences.en: The momentum of multinational companies investing in Shandong has not decreased.
sentences.cn: 跨国公司在山东投资势头不减.

sentences.en: The multinational enterprise takes a global approach to foreign markets and production.
sentences.cn: 跨国企业对国外市场和生产采取全球性方法.

sentences.en: They are coming to work for French and multinational firms in France.
sentences.cn: 他们后来到法国本土受聘于法国及跨国的企业.

sentences.en: They share directors from the top multinational banks and investment houses.
sentences.cn: 他们在最大的一些跨国银行和投资机构中兼任董事.

sentences.en: This article is mainly discussing about the Multinational Corporation's performance evaluation system.
sentences.cn: 本文着重讨论了跨国公司的业绩评价系统.

words.tran_cn: [数] 多边的；多国的，多国参加的
多歧的；多国参加的；分成多部分的

trans.tran_en: a multinational company has factories, offices, and business activities in many different countries
a large company that has offices, factories etc in many different countries
